title: Starter
description: Get 100 Stars and 100 Credits. Perfect for when you're just getting started.

title: Creator
description: Our most popular choice! Get 500 credits and receive a bonus of 50 Credits, for a total of 550 Credits.

title: Pro
description: Go all out with the Pro package. You get 1000 Credits, and we add a huge 400 Credit bonus to supercharge your work, for 1400 Credits in total.
